code: import HomeIcon from"@mui/icons-material/Home";import MilitaryTechIcon from"@mui/icons-material/MilitaryTech";import WorkIcon from"@mui/icons-material/Work";import{Box,Button,Typography}from"@mui/material";import{useNavigate,useParams}from"react-router-dom";import localization from"../../localization.json";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const styleBtn={justifyContent:"flex-start",":hover":{backgroundColor:"#ffffff15"},borderRadius:"12px",height:"48px",padding:"6px 16px"};const styleText={textTransform:"none",color:"#fff",marginLeft:"16px"};const listOfNavigations=[{id:1,name:localization["home"],icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HomeIcon,{sx:{color:"#fff"}})},{id:2,name:localization["projects"],icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WorkIcon,{sx:{color:"#fff"}})},{id:3,name:localization["certificates"],icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MilitaryTechIcon,{sx:{color:"#fff"}})}];const Navigations=()=>{const params=useParams();const navigate=useNavigate();const handleClickProject=name=>{navigate(name.toLowerCase());};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{display:"flex",flexDirection:"column",sx:{gap:"16px"},children:listOfNavigations.map(navigate=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Button,{"aria-label":navigate.name,style:{backgroundColor:params["*"]===navigate.name.toLowerCase()||params["*"]===""&&navigate.id===1?"#ffffff15":""},sx:styleBtn,disableRipple:true,onClick:()=>{handleClickProject(navigate.name);},children:[navigate.icon,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"body1",sx:styleText,children:navigate.name})]},navigate.id))});};export default Navigations;
